content: CFS-CID P Cast-in firestop sleeve One-step firestop cast-in sleeve for 8 and 10 plastic and insulated metal pipe penetrations through floors. Place it and forget it ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and simple installation – designed to increase your productivity and reduce labor costs Five heights available to cover all your jobsite requirements (6, 8, 10, 12 and 14) Peace of mind – cast-in devices remove scope for errors compared to traditional methods, leading to more reliable firestopping of vertical penetrations Creates an opening with the firestop already included – no coring or coming back for firestopping required Applications New building construction (flat concrete) For use with PVC pipes For use with metal pipes with insulation Available in 6, 8, 10, 12 and 14 heights For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 0 g/l W-rating: Yes, with sealant Application temperature range: -40 - 120 °F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 0 g/l | W-rating | Yes, with sealant | Application temperature range | -40 - 120 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2155563 - CFS-CID P 8/ 6 Height - Package Size 1 pc - 2155564 - CFS-CID P 8/ 8 Height - Package Size 1 pc - 2155565 - CFS-CID P 8/ 10 Height - Package Size 1 pc - 2155566 - CFS-CID P 8/ 12 Height - Package Size 1 pc - 2163201 - CFS-CID P 8/ 14 Height - Package Size 1 pc - 2163207 - CFS-CID P 10 6 height - Package Size 1 pc - 2163208 - CFS-CID P 10 8 height - Package Size 1 pc - 2163209 - CFS-CID P 10 10 height - Package Size 1 pc - 2163210 - CFS-CID P 10 12 height - Package Size 1 pc - 2163211 - CFS-CID P 10 14 height - Package Size 1 pc
